page.title: 16Sarn W.I.
page.content: Sarn W.I. is held once every month. People go there to listen to what is going on.They sit down and someone talks.They eat some food and have drinks.They hold the meetings at the Village Hall in Sarn.They make {speeches.}It starts at 7.00pm and finishes at 10.00pm.Sometimes a lady does some cooking.They made a book about what people do in Sarn.They go on a trip once a year.They have a rounders team and they practise.They go away for matches.They have a Buffet Dance, and a whistdrive and Sarn Show.They have games on the recreation field to make money for the W.I.
